Package org.elasticsearch.search.facet.geodistance

Interface Summary
GeoDistanceFacet  
 

Class Summary
GeoDistanceFacet.Entry  
GeoDistanceFacetBuilder A geo distance builder allowing to create a facet of distances from a specific location including the number of hits within each distance range, and aggregated data (like totals of either the distance or cusotm value fields).
